Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1970...
Injured on 4/15/1972 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/24/1972 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1973, off Dick Joyce (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/1973, off Luis Tiant (CIN)...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 7/14/1977...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against St. Louis on 8/3/1977...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against San Francisco on 9/16/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1977, hitting .600 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 5/5/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 8/8/1978...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1978, hitting .395 with 5 HR, 19 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1978, hitting .342 with 11 HR, 94 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 8/11/1979...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1980, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1981, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 7/28/1981...
Injured on 8/24/1981 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Houston on 4/28/1982...
Had 6 hits with 0 RBI against Houston on 6/27/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/23/1984 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/24/1984, off Rick Sutcliffe (PHI)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Texas on 7/31/1984 (Going to PIT: P T. Carroll. Going to TEX: SS B. Madlock)...
Injured on 8/4/1984 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/18/1985 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
